name: Rush Hour (itch) (Charcool)
description:
THIS GAME IS BETTER IN FULLSCREEN!

-CONTROLS-

WASD - Move

Click Food Icon to choose and then press the Send Button

-DESCRIPTION-

This is a Fast Food Simulator game where you have to prepare burgers, cook meat and put fries in the fryer. This is loosely based off of McDonalds and other competing Fast Food Franchises, but don't sue me please. This game was made for VMC Hosted by Legends Media. Have some fun!

-THEME-

This game fits the theme because towards the end of the game, the rush hour gets more and more chaotic.

-SOCIAL MEDIA-

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMzUQJQ_ZgAy4Za2EEi4X1w

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Charcool15

-CREDIT-

Art Made in - Aseprite

Sound Effects from - Zapsplat.com
